General.Name: Sporting Clube de Braga - Futebol SAD
General.Description: Sporting Clube de Braga - Futebol, SAD operates as a sports club in Potugal. It engages in the football and other sports related activities, including swimming, futsal, billiards, taekwondo, basketball, beach soccer, and volleyball. The company was founded in 1921 and is based in Braga, Portugal.
General.Address: Estádio Municipal de Braga, Braga, Portugal, 4700-087

1.Name: Joaquim Manuel Azevedo Baptista da Costa
